rules_text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of your end step, if a nontoken creature died this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. [i](It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
notes:
